title: Five are Live at 80% of Asking price
author: frankbmd

posts.post_title: Five are Live at 80% of Asking price
posts.post_content:
Pastorius    -    SC 150    -   BVG 5    -      $240.  now $192

[IMG]https://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/t206-bvg/28550/pastorius[/IMG]

Reulbach Glove Shows     -    P150     -      PSA 3    -    $OLD.  now $128

[IMG]https://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/t206-psa/51657/reulbach-glove-shows[/IMG]

Rudolph       -      SC350     -    PSA 5.5      -     $370   now $296

[IMG]https://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/t206-psa/25364/rudolph[/IMG]

Shaw, Hunky    -    Polar Bear   -    BVG 5    -   $400.  now $320

[IMG]https://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/t206-bvg/10204/shaw-h.-pb[/IMG]

White, Foley  SL    -     P350    -    BVG 3     -   $180. now $144

[IMG]https://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/t206-bvg/10229/white-f-sl[/IMG]

Wiltse, Hooks  c Cap   -   Polar Bear   -  PSA 4   -   $220    now $176

[IMG]https://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/t206-psa/51656/wiltse-portait-with-glove[/IMG]


Free shipping -  Prices net to me  -  Prefer Checks and Money Orders to Family and Friends on PP.  PP fees for Goods and Services are your responsibility.

Thank for looking.

Do not resist the temptation to buy before they are gone.

Prices subject to change after 30 days.

You may have focused on “sex” rather than “sell” in the title.  

Therefore I am editing the title.

As a further enticement, with each sale for the asking price, I will include a valuable top loader containing a portrait of Andrew Jackson.  You never got that from Don West.

The top loader offer has expired.

However

All cards are reduced by 20% of the original asking price

If your math agrees with mine, let’s do it.

I’ll take Reulbach! Thank you!

Todd
Frank, I will take the Reulbach.  PayPal ok? John

Title now reflects the current status.

Note also that instead of 20% off, you now pay only 80% of the asking price.:eek::eek::eek:
